updates-and-changes-content: We reserve the right to update these terms at any time. Changes take effect once published on the website. We encourage you to review the terms periodically to stay informed.
limitation-of-liability-content: We are not responsible for any damage or loss resulting from your use of this website. You use the site at your own risk.
